mapper.sql: type AS "type", customer_id AS "customerId", instock_log_detail_id AS "instockLogDetailId", instock_log_id AS "instockLogId", inkind_id AS "inkindId", sku_id AS "skuId", brand_id AS "brandId", number AS "number", instock_order_id AS "instockOrderId", storehouse_id AS "storehouseId", storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_instock_log_detail where 1 = 1
and instock_log_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockLogDetailId},'%')
and instock_log_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockLogId},'%')
and inkind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inkindId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and instock_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockNumber},'%')
and instock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockOrderId},'%')
and lot_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.lotNumber},'%')
and effective_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.effectiveDate},'%')
and manufacture_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.manufactureDate},'%')
and serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and received_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.receivedDate},'%')
and storehouse_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehouseId},'%')
and selling_price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sellingPrice},'%')
and cost_price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.costPrice},'%')
and storehouse_positions_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehousePositionsId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
